title: Potatos an inferior good, rice a normal good

content.question: Assume that consumers consider potatoes to be an inferior good, but consider rice to be a normal good. An increase in consumersâ€™ incomes will most likely affect the equilibrium price and quantity of potatoes and rice in which of the following ways?

choices.label: Potatoes Rice Price Quantity Price Quantity Decrease Decrease Increase Increase
Potatoes Rice Price Quantity Price Quantity Decrease Increase Increase Decrease
Potatoes Rice Price Quantity Price Quantity Decrease Decrease Decrease Decrease
Potatoes Rice Price Quantity Price Quantity Increase Increase Decrease Decrease
Potatoes Rice Price Quantity Price Quantity Increase Decrease Increase Decrease

content.answer: Potatoes Rice Price Quantity Price Quantity Decrease Decrease Increase Increase

topic.text: 2.7: Market Disequilibrium and Changes in Equilibrium

skill.text: Skill 3.A: Determine the outcome of an economic situation using economic concepts, principles, or models.
